response.overview: From the blocks of EMB, the Gold Coast of Australia, the cement contours of Burnside bridge and the streets of the world, Thrasher Magazine presents The Truth Hurts, a commercial free cavalcade of modern skateboarding in it's rawest, grittiest form. From your VCR, life footage of  • Henry • Speyer • Daewon • Plan B • Think • Salman • Gonz • Karma • Real • Stereo • Cardiel • Senn • Duane • World • New Deal. Plus blunts, freaks, beefs, microwaves, contests and funky fly dope flava from the street. On the music tip, a conversation with Ice-T & Bodycount and authorized songs by:  • Bad Religion • Broken English • Mad Flava • The Dwarves • Tar • Dick Dale • Billy Childish • Rancid • NoFX • The Didgits • Supersuckers • Coffin Break • The Mermen • Cosmic Psychos • RKL • The Coup. With more syncopated sounds guaranteed to completely blow your mind.
response.title: Thrasher - The Truth Hurts
